item.title: Billie Eilish - come out and play
item.description:
Ukulele play along
Come Out And Play - Billie Eilish
Using the chords: Am C Cmaj7 Dm Em F G G7
Suggested Strum Patterns: Single strums or D DU D DU (slow)
Website: http://ukulele.wales/ Ukulele Wales Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQxNRbyi3i4Nvqpo55bWBkg T-Shirts & Merch: https:https://www.redbubble.com/people/ukulaliens/shop
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Steven Universe - We Are the Crystal Gems
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA Ukulele. Keys of F & G.
Chords Used: F, A7, Bb, C, Bbm, Gm7, Am7, Bbm7, E7, Am, Dm, G, Cmaj7, D7, C7, B7, Cm, Em, Gmaj7
As performed on Steven Universe
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/pdzcOAduI8E
******************** Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion.
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher. If you don't have a podcast app, please check out Radio Public for all your podcasts--they support podcasters financially.

item.title: Suspicious Minds - Elvis Presley - Ukulele Play Along
item.description:
Ukulele play along
Suspicious Minds - Elvis Presley Written by Mark James
Using the chords: Bm B7 C D D7 Em G
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU U DU
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Train - Calling All Angels
item.description:
Calling All Angles by Train. It’s been lowered by 3 semitones so beginner ukulele players can play along. Chords used: G, C, F, Am, and Dm. The lyric video was created and posted by YouTuber Earthquaker, I simply added the chords. For educational use.
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: Elton John - Rocket Man
item.description:
Ukulele play along
Rocket Man - Elton John Written by Elton John and Bernie Taupin
Using the chords: Am7 C D Dm F G
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU U DU (island strum)
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: You Gotta Sing Ukulele Play Along
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of Am.
Chords Used: Am, E7, Dm
As performed by Nancy Cassidy.
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/JWGOXTMNwSA
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com. Video from motionbolt.com.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6
We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!

item.title: Israel Kamakawiwo'ole - What A Wonderful World
item.description:
Ukulele play along of Somewhere Over The Rainbow & Wonderful World as recorded by Israel Kamakawiwo'ole'
Having had lots of requests to do the version with both songs here is a different version to our original Somewhere Over The Rainbow.
Originally written for the film "The Wizard Of Oz" Music by Harold Arlen and lyrics by Yip Harburg
Using the chords: Am C Dm E7 Em F G
Suggested Strum Pattern: D DU U DU
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Lift Every Voice And Sing - Ukulele Play Along
item.description:
Lift Every Voice and Sing by the Abyssinian Baptist Church. It’s been lowered by 3 semitones so beginner ukulele students can play along. For educational use. Chords Used: C, F, A7, Dm, Bbdim, Dm, Gm, A, Bb, D, D7
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play along videos at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6. We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!

item.title: Kodaline - All I Want
item.description:
Ukulele play along
All I Want - Kodaline
Using the chords: Am C Dm F G
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU DU (fast)
This video is meant for educational purposes and ukulele lessons.
No copyright infringement intended.

item.title: Survivor - 'Rocky" Eye Of The Tiger
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of Dm
Chords Used: Dm, C, A, Bb, F, Gm
As performed by Survivor.
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/tbjfpz8at8A
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com.
